name: Vardhman Soft
overview:
Vardhman Soft a Web Development company from India offers low cost Web & Software Development services. We has indigenously developed PHP MySQL Based GPS Vehicle Tracking Software / Fleet Management System that runs on Linux Platform.

Vardhman has developed online software to track GPS track assets with following features:-

â€¢ Open Source Software in PHP, MySQL, AJAX hosted on a Linux server and is customizable to any extent â€¢ Live Tracking using Google & Yahoo Maps â€¢ Child Tracking. â€¢ GPS Personal Tracking Software â€¢ Machine Tracking â€¢ Generator Tracking Solution â€¢ Reports like::- Distance Report, Vehicle Report, Ignition Report, Stoppage Report, Speed Report, Today Report, Depot Report, History Report, Fuel Graph â€¢ Email & SMS Alerts for:- Depot, Geo Fencing, Speed Limit â€¢ Manage Depot â€¢ Manage Geo Fence Area â€¢ Change Password â€¢ Manage Assets â€¢ Manage Users â€¢ Assign Assets & Growing Option to purchase dedicated hosting for vehicle tracking. http://www.vardhmansoft.com/gps-vehicle-tracking-software-fleet-management-system.php
